description:
http://anidb.net/ch111713 [Mana]`s younger sister http://anidb.net/ch111714 [Kotono] and a mysterious girl with Mana`s voice, http://anidb.net/ch111715 [Kawasaki Sakura], passes the audition to sign with Hoshimi Productions. They move into the company dorms to start their path to become idols.
Source: Funimation
